Cerita Koster Rayu Warga dan Pecalang di TPA Suwung Soal Sampah
06 Nov 2019, 15:49 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - Gubernur Bali Wayan Koster ikut angkat bicara soal polemik pembuangan sampah di tempat pembuangan sampah akhir (TPA) Suwung, Denpasar, Bali. Koster mengungkap pihaknya ikut merayu kelian (kepala) adat dan pecalang untuk menghentikan aksi blokade truk pengangkut sampah.
"Ini yang ngelarang pembuangan sampah ke TPA Suwung bukan gubernur, tapi kelian adat dengan pecalangnya. Tadinya semua pemda termasuk Denpasar semua dilarang ke sana, karena situasinya sudah crowded," kata Koster usai mengikuti rapat di DPRD Bali, Jl Dr Kusumah Atmadja, Renon, Denpasar, Bali, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Koster menuturkan pihaknya juga sudah meninjau ke lokasi dan memanggil kelian adat Pesanggaran ke rumah dinasnya. Dia menuturkan dari hasil lobinya, pihak adat akhirnya bersedia mengizinkan Denpasar untuk bisa membuang sampah di TPA Suwung.
"Termasuk saya sudah berkunjung ke sana, kita tahu lapangannya seperti itu, bahkan wali kota melakukan pendekatan pun ditolak sama keliannya dan pecalangnya sampai saya harus mengundang ke Jaya Saba. Kelian dengan pecalangnya, saya rayu-rayu akhirnya Denpasar dikasih," paparnya.
Dia menuturkan pihak kelian adat Pesanggaran menyepakati beberapa poin. Salah satunya pembatasan pembuangan sampah ke areal TPA Suwung yang menjadi pusat pembuangan sampah dari Denpasar, Badung, Gianyar, dan Tabanan (Sarbagita) itu.
"Tabanan sanggup membuang sementara di wilayahnya, Gianyar sanggup, kemudian Badung tidak sanggup. Badung minta waktu dua bulan itu pun ditolak, kemudian satu hari 30 truk itu ditolak, semua yang menolak kelian dengan pecalang. Saya merayu dua bulan permintaan Badung dikasih satu bulan, dari 30 truk per hari disetujui hanya 15 truk oleh kelian adat, bahkan kota Denpasar pun tidak setuju dengan Badung membuang sampah ke sana," paparnya.

The Story of Koster Seducing Residents and Pecalang at the TPA Suwung Problem Trash
Nov 6 2019, 15:49 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Denpasar - Bali Governor Wayan Koster joined in talking about the polemic on waste disposal in Suwung's final landfill, Denpasar, Bali. Koster revealed that his side had also seduced kelian (chief) of adat and pecalang to stop the blockade of the garbage truck.
"This is forbidding the disposal of garbage to the Suwung landfill, not the governor, but the customary tradition of the prospect. Previously all regional governments, including Denpasar, were banned there, because the situation was already crowded," Koster said after attending a meeting at the Bali DPRD, Jl Dr. Kusumah Atmadja, Renon, Denpasar, Bali, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Koster said that his side had also visited the location and summoned the Pesanggaran customs to his official residence. He said from the results of his lobbying, the customary party finally agreed to allow Denpasar to be able to dispose of garbage at the Suwung landfill.
"Including I have visited there, we know the field is like that, even the mayor did the same approach and was rejected by the shrewd and the losers until I had to invite to Jaya Saba. Kelian with the losers, I was seduced finally Denpasar was given," he explained.
He said that the Kelurahan Pesanggaran agreed on several points. One of them is the limitation of garbage disposal to the Suwung landfill area, which is the center of garbage disposal from Denpasar, Badung, Gianyar, and Tabanan (Sarbagita).
"Tabanan was able to temporarily dispose of its territory, Gianyar was able, then Badung could not. Badung asked for two months to be rejected, then one day 30 trucks were rejected, all who refused to be lonely with pecalang. I seduced two months Badung's request was given one month, "Of the 30 trucks per day only 15 trucks are approved by kelian adat, even the city of Denpasar does not agree with Badung to dispose of garbage there," he explained.
